question: Which the following become the citizens of India if a foreign territory is incorporated into India?
option1: All the persons residing there become the citizens of India
option2: Persons specified by the Government of India
option3: Only educated persons become citizen of India
answer: Persons specified by the Government of India
explanation: If a foreign territory is incorporated into India, the Government of India specifies the persons who among the people of the territory shall be the citizens of India. Such persons become the citizens of India from the notified date.
